plugin.name: Fixed MP Regeneration
plugin.description: Multiplies the number of steps necessary to gain 1 MP by the speed mode multiplier. So it is no longer possible to exploit the speed-mode by running around in circles to regain a lot of MP.

plugin.name: Lift Story Restrictions
plugin.description: Allows the usage of the following things from the start of the game: Party-, equipment-, licenses- and gambits menu, world and minimap, clan primer and much more.

plugin.name: No Overhead Party HP Bars
plugin.description: Removes the overhead HP bars of the party.

plugin.name: No Overhead Foe HP Bars
plugin.description: Removes the overhead HP bars of foes (incl. friendly).

plugin.name: No Overlay Map
plugin.description: Disables the overlay map which would displayed in the middle of the screen after pressing/clicking the Tab/L3/LS key/button.

plugin.name: No Sounds
plugin.description: Disables all sound input from the game. It's mostly meant to be used when modding, so you don't have to constantly adjust the sound settings per savefile, nor get your ear blasted every time you enter the main menu.

plugin.name: No Speed Mode
plugin.description: Disables the ability to toggle the speed mode feature of the game.

plugin.name: No Teleport Requirement
plugin.description: Teleport stones are no longer required when using the save crystal teleport option.

plugin.name: Removable Targeted Party Members
plugin.description: Enables the ability to remove any targeted party members from the party.

plugin.name: No Mist Bar Restoration On Save Crystals
plugin.description: Touching save crystals will no longer restore mist bars. Furthermore, mist bars will not be restored after a cutscene that initiates a boss battle.

plugin.name: No Restoration On Save Crystals
plugin.description: Touching save crystals will no longer restore HP, MP, etc. or remove any negative status effects.

plugin.name: Forced Keyboard Button Prompts
plugin.description: Forces the game to always use keyboard button prompts, as long as no controller is used.

plugin.name: Forced PS Button Prompts
plugin.description: Forces the game to always use PS button prompts, regardless of the type of controller used.

plugin.name: Forced Xbox Button Prompts
plugin.description: Forces the game to always use XBOX button prompts, regardless of the type of controller used.
